name: AstralTower
description:
Description
A game where you use the power of the astral signs to climb a tower . For now, there is only one floor maybe we will release the rest later.

Controls

D, A / Left, Right Arrows - move left and right
W / Up arrow - Jump
Space - Active Power

Credit

I did all the game by myself except the music that have been done by various artists on internet. Their names are written in the credit inside the game.
